existing_features.title: Add a new “Gallery” section to the single-page site that displays the user-uploaded images in a responsive grid, including a section heading and short descriptive text in English.
Add the uploaded image (image-1.jpg) as a static frontend asset and render it in the Gallery section with an English alt attribute.
Implement an image preview interaction in the Gallery section so that clicking a thumbnail opens a larger preview (modal/lightbox) with the image and accessible controls to close.
Add “Gallery” to the site navigation so users can smoothly scroll to the Gallery section from both desktop and mobile menus.

projectName: Add Gallery pictures section to the site
